item.title: Do you like to ADB?
item.author: nisrulz@gmail.com (Nishant Srivastava)
item.description: Lets face it we all have been there , trying to fiddle with managing our emulators and dev devices. And at max we would do is try to manually manage it.

item.title: Life without wires : ADB over WiFi
item.author: nisrulz@gmail.com (Nishant Srivastava)
item.description: Tired of being tied to your laptop/desktop while debugging your android apps ? Well let me break it to you – You are NOT the FIRST person to do it.
